greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Product_{d|n, d-1 is prime} (d-1)^(1+A286561(n,d-1)), where A286561(n,k) gives the k-valuation of n (for k > 1).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
program: (PARI) A323155(n) = { my(m=1); fordiv(n, d, if(isprime(d-1), m *= (d-1)^(1+valuation(n,d-1)))); (m); }; \\ _Antti Karttunen_, Jan 09 2019
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jan 09 2019
